about_the_game:
Ronin's Way is an unforgiving exploration-survival RPG for 1-4 players, set in a long-lost archipelago, somewhere in the Eastern sea. Engage in epic katana duels, dethrone the local warlords and seize their fortifications, raise your army and forge your own masterless path.

MASTER THE BLADE

Engage in fast-paced combat, wielding your sword and bow with mastery and precision. Each weapon comes with its own unique set of combat stances which you need to uncover and master to overcome the challenges set forth by those who were stranded here before you.

BUILD YOUR LEGACY

Harvest resources, craft tools, and construct everything from humble dwellings to mighty fortresses. With an intuitive building system, transform the untamed wilderness into your sanctuary or a stronghold fit for a ruler.

EXPLORE A WORLD TEEMING WITH MYSTERY

The Isles of Requiem are a land of breathtaking beauty and hidden dangers. Stranded by fate, you awaken in a strange realm where death is fleeting, at the cost of your sanity. Uncover the secrets of this uncharted territory, from serene vistas to the haunting lore of its undying inhabitants.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Massive hand-crafted world, where each corner, house and stump hides a secret to uncover and a mystery to explore.

  • Play alone or with up to 10 players on player-hosted dedicated servers.

  • Intuitive crafting and building system, with a clear no-nonsense progression of materials, which evolve in complexity and difficulty of acquisition in a logical manner.

  • Flexible building system which takes structure (and even some physics!) into account. Build your tiny shelter or impenetrable fortress using a wide array of building parts as well as premade functional assets.

  • Fast paced action combat which rewards preparation and skill. Utilize weapon types with unique attacks, different blocking styles, ranged combat, dodges and parries to fight your enemies. Your blows may be lethal, but so are theirs.

  • Difficult but extremely fair bossfights, which will challenge your level of preparation and mechanical skill. Raise an army or nail the parry timing - there's more than one path to success, and it's all up to your preference.

content_descriptors.notes: It's a samurai-themed game, so there are elements of swordfighting and the expected results thereof. Currently, there are no elements of dismemberment or extreme gore, and blood related elements are kept at a minimum.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVME SSD Preferred
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz+ Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3060 12GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVME SSD Preferred

short_description: A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-4 players, set on an island archipelago inspired by far Eastern culture. Engage in epic katana duels, build and fortify your settlement, raise your army and forge your own masterless path.
